title: An All-Politics Mid-Year Special
description: As the race for the 2020 Democratic presidential nomination heats up, New York Times White House correspondent Katie Rogers and Associated Press national political reporter Juana Summers join Sam for a look at the big threads running through politics right now.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: An All-Politics Mid-Year Special
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Election 2020 is just heating up. We got the scoop from two journalists covering politics and the White House.
itunes:subtitle: Election 2020 is just heating up. We got the scoop from two journalists covering politics and the White House.
content:encoded: As the race for the 2020 Democratic presidential nomination heats up, New York Times White House correspondent Katie Rogers and Associated Press national political reporter Juana Summers join Sam for a look at the big threads running through politics right now.
